data.message: So why cant i share videos on facebook to friends through text? Why do you guys restrict us so much like apple does? Ive been with you guys for so long but as time goes by im starting to hate facebook more and more.

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, De. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2g3ZNfp. -Joe
Sure. How do i find links to videos on fb. Or do you block that now too?
fb can you see the messenger from my question?
Thats the same auto response you will always get. Because those guys are just social network controllers. They have no idea about anything technical.

I agree with you De Nart between getting blocked by Facebook for posting something that somebody didn't like and it was a prayer is ridiculous I like Facebook too but anymore with the cost of Wi-Fi with Cox Facebook it's not worth it
Seriously? One time i reported a post that was soliciting drugs and they told me it wasnt wrong. I was like wth.
Me too! Face book is not God but dictating wannabe God's!

Hah! Try having your click turn completely blank. Just a white page. Have to restart my kindle every time. On top of that can't watch approximately 60% of videos. It sucks so bad. Thank goodness I have books I can read.
